dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper describes an experimental setup for evaluating the physiological effects of radiofrequency RF emitted from a Wideband Code Division Multiple Access WCDMA module with a 24 dBm at 1950 MHz for specific absorption rate SAR 1g of 1 57 W kg This provocation study was executed in a double blind study of two volunteer groups of 10 self reported electromagnetic hypersensitivity EHS and 10 non EHS subjects under both sham and real exposures in a randomly assigned and counter balanced order In the preliminary results WCDMA RF exposure of 30 min did not have any effects on physiological changes in either group
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Effects of RF fields emitted from smart phones on cardio-respiratory parameters: a preliminary provocation study.
